name: Circle Time!
description:
Controls;

Space; switch direction

Objective;

When hitting space you gain speed and switch directions

press space on top of the circle on the bottom to gain a point

press space anywhere else and you will lose a point

when reaching -1 points, the game will end.

Music; Thermal by Context Sensitive (Previously know as Evan King)

Also I am very sorry if the background music is too loud lol XD

This is just a test to see what I could do. It was mostly so my yt viewers could play the game! Dont expect a AAA game title here either lol!
